alert.note: Alert for Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued October 11 at 1:51AM CDT until October 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, St. John The Baptist, St. Charles, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany, Western Orleans, Eastern Orleans and Upper Jefferson Parishes. In Mississippi, Southern Hancock County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
